content:
AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter Class

In this Article

A formatter that serializes a ServiceDocument instance to and from XML using Atom 1.0 formats.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedFrom("System.ServiceModel.Web, Version=3.5.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35")]
[System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRoot(ElementName="service", Namespace="http://www.w3.org/2007/app")]
public class AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter : System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocumentFormatter, System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocumentFormatter
  • AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter

,
WriteElementExtensions(XmlWriter,Workspace,String)

Remarks

Use this class to serialize instances of ServiceDocument to XML and to generate instances of ServiceDocument from an XML document. If you want to serialize or deserialized an object derived from ServiceDocument, use the AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter<TServiceDocument> formatter instead.

Constructors summary

AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter()

Creates a new instance of the Atom 1.0-based ServiceDocumentFormatter class.
AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter(ServiceDocument)

Creates a new instance of the Atom 1.0-based ServiceDocumentFormatter class to serialize a specified service document.
AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter(Type)

Creates a new instance of the Atom 1.0-based ServiceDocumentFormatter class.

Properties summary

Version

Gets the name of Atom Publishing Protocol namespace.

Methods summary

CanRead(XmlReader)

Tests whether the specified XML reader contains a valid service document.
CreateDocumentInstance()

Creates a new ServiceDocument instance associated with the Atom 1.0 formatter.
ReadFrom(XmlReader)

Generates a ServiceDocument object from a specified XML reader.
WriteTo(XmlWriter)

Writes a ServiceDocument object associated with the formatter to a specified XML writer.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IXmlSerializable.GetSchema()

This method is reserved and should not be used.
IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(XmlReader)

Generates a ServiceDocument from its XML representation.
IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(XmlWriter)

Converts the ServiceDocument into its XML representation.

Constructors

  • AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter()

    Creates a new instance of the Atom 1.0-based ServiceDocumentFormatter class.

    public AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter ();
  • AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter(ServiceDocument)

    Creates a new instance of the Atom 1.0-based ServiceDocumentFormatter class to serialize a specified service document.

    public AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter (System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument documentToWrite);

    Parameters

    • documentToWrite
      ServiceDocument

      The ServiceDocument associated with the Atom 1.0 formatter.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      documentToWrite is null.

    Remarks

    The documentToWrite can be serialized to an XML representation or deserialized from an XML representation by the formatter using Atom 1.0 formats.

  • AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter(Type)

    Creates a new instance of the Atom 1.0-based ServiceDocumentFormatter class.

    public AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter (Type documentTypeToCreate);

    Parameters

    • documentTypeToCreate
      Type

      The instance of an object that is derived from a ServiceDocument type that is associated with the Atom 1.0 formatter.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      documentTypeToCreate is null.

    • ArgumentException

      documentTypeToCreate specified is not valid.

    Remarks

    The documentTypeToCreate can be serialized to an XML representation or deserialized from an XML representation by the formatter using Atom 1.0 formats.

Properties

  • Version

    Gets the name of Atom Publishing Protocol namespace.

    public override string Version { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns “http://www.w3.org/2007/app”.

Methods

  • CanRead(XmlReader)

    Tests whether the specified XML reader contains a valid service document.

    public override bool CanRead (System.Xml.XmlReader reader);

    Parameters

    • reader
      XmlReader

      The XML reader.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the XML reader does contain a valid service document; otherwise false.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      reader is null.

  • CreateDocumentInstance()

    Creates a new ServiceDocument instance associated with the Atom 1.0 formatter.

    protected override System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ServiceDocument CreateDocumentInstance ();

    Returns

    • ServiceDocument

      Returns an instance of a ServiceDocument.

  • ReadFrom(XmlReader)

    Generates a ServiceDocument object from a specified XML reader.

    public override void ReadFrom (System.Xml.XmlReader reader);

    Parameters

    • reader
      XmlReader

      The XML reader from which to read the syndication feed.

    Exceptions

    • XmlException

      reader is null.

    • ArgumentNullException

      The XML could not be parsed.

  • WriteTo(XmlWriter)

    Writes a ServiceDocument object associated with the formatter to a specified XML writer.

    public override void WriteTo (System.Xml.XmlWriter writer);

    Parameters

    • writer
      XmlWriter

      The XML writer written to by the formatter.

    Exceptions

    • System.XmlException

      writer is null.

    • InvalidOperationException

      The service document associated with the formatter is null.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IXmlSerializable.GetSchema()

    This method is reserved and should not be used.

    System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema IXmlSerializable.GetSchema ();

    Returns

    • XmlSchema

      Returns null.

    Remarks

    Explicitly implements the GetSchema method.

  • IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(XmlReader)

    Generates a ServiceDocument from its XML representation.

    void IXmlSerializable.ReadXml (System.Xml.XmlReader reader);

    Parameters

    • reader
      XmlReader

      The XmlReader stream from which the ServiceDocument object is deserialized.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      reader is null.

    Remarks

    Explicitly implements the ReadXml method.

  • IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(XmlWriter)

    Converts the ServiceDocument into its XML representation.

    void IXmlSerializable.WriteXml (System.Xml.XmlWriter writer);

    Parameters

    • writer
      XmlWriter

      The XmlWriter stream to which the object is serialized.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      writer is null.

    • InvalidOperationException

      There is no instance of a ServiceDocument associated with the formatter.

    Remarks

    Explicitly implements the WriteXml method.
